entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sparwood
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
